description: Numbers n such that n remains prime through 5 iterations of function f(x) = 9x + 2.
comments: n, 9*n+2, 81*n+20, 729*n+182, 6561*n+1640 and 59049*n+14762 are primes. [From _Vincenzo Librandi_, Aug 05 2010]
prog: (MAGMA) [n: n in [1..19000000] | IsPrime(n) and IsPrime(9*n+2) and IsPrime(81*n+20) and IsPrime(729*n+182) and IsPrime(6561*n+1640) and IsPrime(59049*n+14762)] [From _Vincenzo Librandi_, Aug 05 2010]
author: _David W. Wilson_
